Changes.title: Change Log
Changes.text: Moving along getting the functions online and working

Changes.title: In Review!
Changes.text: Now you can react to a post with our handydandy inreview emote: <:inreview:> to create a thread to discuss the things with the things.

Changes.title: Approval
Changes.text: Our approval command has been editied to automatically delete the threads that are created with in review. Lazy FTW

Changes.title: Database Automations
Changes.text: This had to be put on hold as Discord is a butt with the objects it returns. This will be a headache that future me will tackle when I'm feeling more masochistic.

footer: I'll try to post one of these every time a new major feature is out, or when there is a major change to an existing. As always, you can type !help to get a list of commands, and !help <commandname> to get more specific information on a command
